# find-line-column

npm module for finding the line/column position in a string

## Install

```shell
npm install find-line-column
```

## Use

```javascript
var position = require('find-line-column')("This sentence is short.\nThis one is too.", 29);
// position -> [{ line: 2, col: 5 }]
```
